data.message:
Hello, please help me!
This man has put a link to my facebook, something not true!
Please this picture to be erased!
Please!
Because this picture insult me!
Report image, but I hope to help me!
Thanks!                                                                                www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=376883652683450&set=a.118565378515280.1073741828.100010854551820&type=3&theater

replies.message: Hey, Ivelina. The best way to report something on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content itself. To learn more, please visit our Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2mMD8XR. -Rhea
